name: lightwave-shared-core
description: Lightwave-shared-core is a Python package that serves as a foundational library for the LightWave ecosystem. It provides shared utilities, abstract models, interfaces, and common services with minimal dependencies. This package is designed to be imported and used by other LightWave applications rather than running as a standalone service. It's versioned, published to a private package repository, and follows clean architecture principles as a "Pure Library" with strict separation of concerns
author: joel schaeffer
